info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sweet Grass and north central Park Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 159 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clyde Park, or 12 miles north of Livingston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clyde Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
